biography.placeOfBirth: Stettin, Pomerania, Germany [now Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Heinrich George was born on October 9, 1893 in Stettin, Pomerania, Germany as Georg August Friedrich Hermann Schulz. He was an actor and producer, known for Metropolis (1927), Le maître de poste (1940) and Sur le pavé de Berlin (1931). He was married to Berta Drews. He died on September 25, 1946 in Soviet Special Camp No. 7, Oranienburg, Brandenburg, Germany.
biography.name: Heinrich George

biography.bio: Berta Drews was born on November 19, 1901 in Berlin, Germany as Berta Helene Drews. She was an actress, known for The Tin Drum (1979), It Happened in Broad Daylight (1958) and Jedermannstraße 11 (1962). She was married to Heinrich George. She died on April 10, 1987 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Berta Drews

biography.bio: Joachim Streubel is an actor, known for Tugboat M 17 (1933).
biography.name: Joachim Streubel

biography.bio: Born in Germany to American parents, dark-haired Betty Amann (born Philippine Amann) grew up in the US. She began her screen career as Bee Amann in the mid-'20s, but returned to Germany after appearing in a 'Tom Tyler' Western for low-budget FBO Pictures. Arriving in the wake of Louise Brooks, she was awarded a screen test by producer Erich Pommer and went on to star or co-star in such German productions as Joe May's silent Asphalte (1929) and the talkies The White Devil (1930)-- opposite Lil Dagover and Ivan Mozzhukhin--and Die kleine Schwindlerin (1933), opposite Dolly Haas. She later did Daughters of Today (1933) in England, but was back in Hollywood by the mid-'30s, where she mainly appeared in "Poverty Row" productions. Her final appearance came in Edgar G. Ulmer's bizarre Isle of Forgotten Sins (1943) for rock-bottom PRC Pictures as one of Gale Sondergaard's "hostesses."
biography.name: Betty Amann

biography.bio: Wilfried Seyferth was born on April 21, 1908 in Darmstadt, Hesse, Germany. He was an actor, known for Decision Before Dawn (1951), Der Selbstmörder - Ins Grab kann man nichts mitnehmen (2. Fassung) (1941) and Die goldene Pest (1954). He was married to Eva Ingeborg Scholz, Tatjana Iwanow, Irene Naef and Lu Säuberlich. He died on October 9, 1954 in Wiesbaden, Hesse.
biography.name: Wilfried Seyferth

biography.bio: Maria Schanda was born on November 30, 1910 in Großrußbach, Austria-Hungary. She is an actress, known for Minuit 15, Chambre 9 (1950), Nachtasyl (1959) and In seinem Garten liebt Don Perlimplin Belisa (1966).
biography.name: Maria Schanda

biography.bio: Robert Müller was born on March 29, 1879 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Familie (1960), Gericht bei Nacht (1957) and Daphne Laureola (1962). He died on February 1, 1968 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Robert Müller

biography.placeOfBirth: Stettin, Pomerania, Germany [now Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Kurt Getke was born on July 28, 1884 in Stettin, Pomerania, Germany. He is an actor, known for Adam, Eva und der Apfel (1934), Herr oder Diener? (1934) and Tugboat M 17 (1933).
biography.name: Kurt Getke

biography.bio: Friedrich Ettel was born on June 8, 1890 in Zurich, Switzerland. He was an actor, known for Die andere Seite (1931), Hermine und die sieben Aufrechten (1935) and Laughing Heirs (1933). He died on March 12, 1941 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Friedrich Ettel

biography.bio: Hansjoachim Büttner was born on November 2, 1900 in Coburg, Germany as Hans Joachim Richard Werner. He was an actor, known for Der Richter von Zalamea (1956), Die Heinitzer (1965) and His Late Excellency (1935). He died on July 28, 1973 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic.
biography.name: Hansjoachim Büttner

biography.bio: Walter Steiner is an actor and director, known for A Romance of Seattle (1919), The Belle of Kenosha (1923) and Die blonde Nachtigall (1930).
biography.name: Walter Steiner

biography.bio: Alexander Jonas is an actor, known for Tugboat M 17 (1933).
biography.name: Alexander Jonas
